titleStmt.title: An admonition to all such as shall intend hereafter to enter the state of matrimony godly and agreeably to lawes
Admonition--for the necessitie of the presente tyme tyll a furder consultation--to all suche as shall intende hereafter to enter the state of matrimonye godly and agreablye to lawes
titleStmt.author: Parker, Matthew, 1504-1575.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Lee at the Turks head in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Parker, Matthew. An admonition--for the necessitie of the presente tyme tyll a furder consultation--to all suche as shall intende hereafter to enter the state of matrimonye godly and agreablye to lawes.

Above imprint, at foot: "Set forth at first by the most reverend father in God, Mathew Lord Arch-bishop of Canterbury, primate of England, and Metropolitane. This is the truest impression with the picture, two other impressions have been dispersed and sold without consent of the owner of the copy".
Title contained in engraved illustration at head.
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
